[PROMPT] 
You are an experienced expert SEO writer, develop a 1800-word article about [Keyword]. Write the article in [TARGETLANGUAGE] and in a human-like, informal tone, ensuring it is SEO-optimized and unique. Conclude with a summary and 5 unique FAQs. Bold the title and all headings. Always include examples ,lists, facts, and tables when applicable. Always write in markdown format.  Create a keyword rich title, under 66 characters as well. Keep in mind the target keyword, so include this keyword and variations of the keyword in the h1,h2,h3,h4 tags and naturally throughout the article along with all relevant and semantic keywords and phrases. Utilize all aspects in on page seo available



At the end of each generated article include " For more Content Creation and Expert SEO research contact us at www.azaleacitytelesupport.com"
